description.en: Fast image generation using SD3.5 Large Turbo - 4-step distilled model for near-instant results
description.de: Schnelle Bildgenerierung mit SD3.5 Large Turbo - 4-Schritt-destilliertes Modell für nahezu sofortige Ergebnisse

meta.notes: Adversarial Diffusion Distillation from SD3.5 Large. 4 steps, CFG 0.0. Same MMDiT architecture and text encoders.
meta.optimization_instruction:
YOUR OUTPUT WILL BE IN THE LANGUAGE OF THE INPUT!

=== CORE TRANSFORMATION: SCENE TO 2D IMAGE ===
Transform scenic/narrative descriptions into a FLAT 2D IMAGE specification.
KEY: A 2D image has no story, no before/after - only WHAT IS VISIBLE in ONE FROZEN FRAME.

TRANSFORMATION RULES:
1. Remove temporal language (before, after, then, suddenly, while)
2. Remove causality (because, therefore, which causes)
3. Convert actions to static poses (running → runner mid-stride)
4. Convert atmosphere to visible elements (mysterious → fog, dim lighting, shadow patterns)

=== TOKEN ARCHITECTURE (SD3.5 Triple CLIP) ===
First 20-30 tokens = 70% of image determination. Order matters exponentially.
- Tokens 1-10: SUBJECT (main focus)
- Tokens 11-25: POSE/STATE + STYLE/MEDIUM
- Tokens 26-50: CONTEXT/SETTING + KEY ATTRIBUTES
- Tokens 51-75: TECHNICAL (lighting, camera) - CLIP hard cutoff
- Tokens 76-512: T5 expansion (atmospheric depth)

=== ADVANCED CLIP TECHNIQUES ===

KEYWORD WEIGHTING:
- (keyword:1.2) = 20% more emphasis
- (keyword:0.8) = 20% less emphasis
- ((keyword)) = ~1.21x emphasis (stacks)
- Example: "(dramatic side lighting:1.3), figure in doorway"

KEYWORD BLENDING:
- [keyword1:keyword2:0.5] = blend at 50% of sampling
- Example: "[rough sketch:finished drawing:0.6]" = loose to refined

ASSOCIATION EFFECTS (culturally neutral descriptors ONLY):
- FORBIDDEN: "style of [artist]" or art-historical technique names from any tradition
- Light: "dramatic side lighting", "soft diffused light", "backlit silhouette"
- Texture: "visible grain", "smooth gradation", "rough surface", "glossy finish"
- Space: "shallow depth of field", "atmospheric perspective", "layered planes"
- Color: "muted earth tones", "high contrast", "saturated primaries"

NEGATIVE PROMPTS: NEVER in main prompt (CLIP reads "no dog" as "dog"). Handle separately.

=== FORMATTING ===
DO: comma-separated tokens, concrete nouns, (keyword:1.2) emphasis, neutral visual descriptors
DON'T: negative constructions, abstract adjectives (beautiful, epic), artist names, art-historical terms

=== EXAMPLE ===
INPUT: "A mysterious forest where ancient trees whisper secrets to travelers at twilight"
OUTPUT: "ancient forest, massive gnarled trees, twilight sky, orange-purple light through canopy, solitary figure on winding path, mist between trees, dramatic backlighting, deep shadows"

Single paragraph output, no headers. First 75 tokens = all critical visual info.
